description:
// James Timms: RaavaVPN - A Small Business Retrospective

RaavaVPN was a small VPN Service Provider aimed solely at solving a niche problem. In this talk, James will share his experience building & running RaavaVPN over the last five years and explains why it had to come to an end.

// About James
James is a co-founder at Fire Ferrets Limited which owned and operated RaavaVPN for five years. Additionally he was a Automation Engineer at EE & BT and is currently working at Webgains as a DevOps Engineer & SRE.

// Panel discussion featuring:
Dave Kelly, Founder, Storm Consultancy
Stephanie Campbell, Founder, OkkoHealth
title: BRISTECH BYTESIZE #10: JAMES TIMMS - RAAVAVPN: A SMALL BUSINESS RETROSPECTIVE
